entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.PointOfService (POS) compatible with .net5+ projects #96071
  • [question] crossgen2 grenerates misaligned relocations #96066
  • System.ExecutionEngineException: Attempting to JIT compile method '(wrapper runtime-invoke) object <Module>:runtime_invoke_void_CGRect_CGRect_single (object,intptr,intptr,intptr)' while running in aot-only mode. #96063
  • .NET8 exception on M1 arm setup (Exception has occurred: CLR/System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException) #96061
  • Swift into .NET using `CallConvSwift` and `UnmanagedCallersOnly` calling convention #96059
    9.0.0
  • Follow-up on workload infrastructure feedback provided in 6.0 Preview 7 #96058
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT doesn't produce a warning if `StartupHookSupport` is enabled #96052
  • [mono] Failing runtime JIT/SIMD/Vector3Interop_r/ro tests on osx-arm64. #96051
  • [mono][tests] Multiple library tests report icall_wrapper_mono_generic_class_init failure #96050
  • Unnecessary call to `CORINFO_HELP_RNGCHKFAIL` with subtraction and bitwise and #96046

Closed

  • [Enhancement] Provide More Detailed Information in System.TypeLoadException for Incorrect MethodImplAttribute Marking #94967
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.IL nuget packages is broken #49135
    Future
  • Unexpected NullReferenceException when running application on Linux #94847
    9.0.0
  • Exception when adding console logging #96010
  • A specific HttpRequestException cannot be catched and terminates the whole Console App #94277
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement missing functionalities #94215
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement missing functionalities #94216
  • Kerberos ticket is not fetched when target is a user #16576
    Future
  • [wasm][aot] JsonSerializer.Serialize produced incorrect result #96043
  • Like Tiering, Levels of Verification And Safety #39605
    Future
  • Azure Virtual Machine serial console - Process terminated error #71224
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [PERF] Update osx.1015 queue to osx.13 queue. #96076
    area-Infrastructure
  • Change Native AOT ThreadBuffer.m_threadId to OS thread id #96075
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix hot/cold splitting #96074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix the decoding of some runtime invoke wrappers. #96072
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_ALWAYS fall-through check in Compiler::fgFindInsertPoint #96070
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Simplify codegen for div/mod #96068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • New exception handling diagnostic fixes #96065
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add emitUnitTests.sh #96064
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Add branch label names to disasm #96057
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #96055
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #96053
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix crash when processing aliases that do not point at names #96048
    area-System.Text.Json, source-generator
  • Disallow reuse of PInvoke transition frame by marshalling helper calls #96047
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Browser.targets: Fix .dlls being deployed to `publish/` #96045
    area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Provide More Detailed Information in System.TypeLoadException for Incorrect MethodImplAttribute Marking #95833
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove dotnet8 feeds from NuGet.config #95860
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix hardcoded ILAsm package version in Microsoft.NET.SDK.IL #96069
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Introduce BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET block kind #95945
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use GenerateFileFromTemplate task from arcade instead of repo copy #96049
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Handle mod in SetThrowHelperBlocks #96056
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Gate emit unit tests on JitDumpEmitUnitTests instead of define #96005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][docs] Reflect current workflow of building individual runtime tests #96054
    area-Meta
  • [mono] Disable Vector3Interop_r/ro tests on osx-arm64 #96060
    needs-area-label
  • Fix JSON format exception attribution #96040
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization support IgnoreKanaType #96002
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [browser] Disable crashing tests on HybridGlobalization #96031
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, disabled-test

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Refactored GCToEEInterface and RedhawkGCInterface implementations into separate files. #95991
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • WIP: Testing iOS library mode with NativeAOT on CI #94999
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Allow specifying indent size and whitespace character when writing JSON #95985
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Updating Sum() implementation for Vector128 and Vector256 + adding lowering for Vector512 #95568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NO-MERGE] CoreCLR runtime instrumentation for measuring type load performance #95288
    NO-MERGE, area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IH_3A` to `SVE_JO_3A` #95994
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [LoongArch64] add LoongArch64's SIMD128/256 instructions within emitter. #95456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [mono] Test upgrading to ICU 72.3 #95610
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono
  • [browser] introduce JSProxyContext #95959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove no-diff BBF_NONE_QUIRK checks #95999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CX_4A group #95918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Re-add Stack Overflow handling in NativeAOT with larger alternate stack #95808
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE2: Add IF_SVE_DQ_0A, IF_SVE_DR_1A, IF_SVE_DS_2A #95996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono] Adding osx-arm64 Mono Interpreter runtime tests job to extra-platforms #96023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use multi-reg load/store for EncodeToUtf8 #95513
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [browser] Use whole assembly name when looking for already loaded assemblies #96018
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [aot][browser] Stop throwing in CultureInfo getter #95910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Console.Unix: fix ANSI colors over redirected standard output. #95654
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Optimize circular buffers #95989
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Implement KMAC #96025
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Publishing broken #2461

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Official windows build does not build tests #2463
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fold shadow stack save into the PI transition #2460

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable libraries testing #2452

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mistake in Spanish localization for the CLI #37537
  • [NETSDKE2E]Publishing blazorwasm project failed with AOT compilation = true with .net9 SDK #37524

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37543
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix sln add for duplicate projects under different paths with same root #37542
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Use dotnet home instead of null when writing state file #37546
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update minimum VS version to 17.8 in 8.0.2xx #37517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix sln add for duplicate projects under different paths with same root #37516
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Permit setting whether to use workload sets or loose manifests Fixes #34561 #37346
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve Container support for AOT publishing and targeting musl runtimes. #37054
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Enable TerminalLogger by default for .NET 9 SDKs #37492
    untriaged, breaking-change, Area-CLI, DO NOT MERGE, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.1xx
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add escape hatch for publishing with SelfContained=true, but no RuntimeIdentifier. #37368
    Area-External, Servicing-consider

Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: BinaryCompatOnlyAttribute #7706

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate SourceNamespaceSymbol.ForceComplete member handling #71286
  • No errors reported at use-site for task type with inaccessible builder type #71283
  • The source generator fails with weird error messages, which don't express the true reason of failure. #71280
  • Replace GitHub automation for requiring reviews of PRs that cange the .NET SDK version #71275
  • Rationalize spread optimization targeting List when collection-expr contains spread values of ICollection type #71273

Closed

  • IDE0010 False positive case var #71281
  • Stack overflow in Rosyln CodeAnalysis when ambiguous name is used #71039
    17.9
  • Extend ReadOnlySpan optimization to all constant data #69472
    17.9
  • Type alias for function pointer fails to compile in cast expression #71278
  • Unused class generated when using Expression<Func<>> #71263

PullRequests

Created

  • Speed up integration test build by only building required dependencies #71289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Provide 'return' keyword in attribute context for accessor #71288
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix implementing abstract method with type parameter constaint on specific reference type #71287
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • For PR val only #71285
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not call Unsubst if it is not available due to argument processing #71282
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • [Attempt #2] Do not report separate diagnostics just for fading #71277
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Remove GitHub automation requiring reviews when the SDK version changes #71276
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #71274
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Split integration test build from test run #71166
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue when we report a missing default case in switch statements with patterns #71284
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify some MEF imports/exports #71272
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Do not resolve diagnostics early during attribute binding #71140
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove extra backslash from IBC script #71264
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Localize 17.9 branch #71249
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the binlog version mismatch in 17.8 #71255
  • Revert "Merge pull request #71258 from mavasani/RemoveFadingDiagnostics" #71269
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection expression spread optimization #71195
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add OrchardCore test to OptProf config #69909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Params Collections: Implement "Better function member" section of the proposal #71271
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Allow collection expressions with `CreateCompilation` #71134
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
  • Extract compilation-tracker/SG-production code out of SolutionState to a new owner. #71257
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement json serialization/deserialization for LSP json messages. Part 2/N #68990
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Standardize use of prepareMachine for ci cleanup #71265
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Implement json serialization/deserialization for LSP json messages. Part 1/N. #71141
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not compile all types during ENC #71254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Only apply one document info change for linked documents #71220
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor .NET 8: RZ10020 Attribute 'bind-Value:get' can only be used with RazorLanguageVersion 7.0 or higher #52845
  • Attempt to change email to another user's email/username using Identity API results in mismatch between email and username #52842
  • Unable to use a enum as a key for keyed services in controller constructor #52841
  • Endpoint with wildcard param clashes with route without one causing Open API document not to be generated #52835
  • Add logout to Identity API endpoints #52834

Closed

  • Invalidating ModelMetadata #51091
  • `dotnet watch` WebSockets port configuration for HotReload #39608
    Backlog
  • When doing hot reload, if it must rebuild, add an option to have it start on the page it was last. #41111
    Backlog
  • RenderFragment becomes visible after hot reload #42312
    Backlog
  • Blazor 8 InteractiveServer : newly created cookie not available in second pass of MainLayout.razor #52759
  • .net 7 and 8 AddFacebook #52836
  • How To Obfuscation WASM Files #52806
  • In Blazor, give the user the ability to use CSS Isolation but without using .razor file #52826
  • Telegram miniapp (TMA) developmet via blazor #52825
  • Blazor Enhanced Load navigation doesn't replace template elements #51692
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b3a9ba2` to `530d5c8` #52839
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/upload-artifact from 3 to 4 #52840
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Remove InvariantGlobalization in templates (#52428) #52461
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #52668
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52823
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Add ForgotPasswordRequest to STJ source generation context #52830
    Servicing-consider, area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-counters does not produce metrics when GC was running? #4395
    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • App doesn't run App.xaml.cs after killing ForegroundService and reopening it #19453
  • Screenshot capture failing intermittently #19450
  • Image/MauiImage does not render a particular SVG #19448
  • when i change the XAML UI it doesn't update automatically. I need to restart the app to update the UI :( #19445
  • [testing] Android API27 Controls tests fail to start on DevDiv #19443
    Backlog
  • [Windows] RadioButtonGroup.SelectedValue = null doesn't reset RadioButton IsChecked state #19437
  • Collection view + popups performance, bug or as is? #19433

Closed

  • Support deep linking into .NET MAUI Blazor apps #3788
  • [iOS] When using a ScrollView with Shell the ContentSize isn't sizing consistently with Forms #16352
  • [regression/8.0.3] [iOS] PushModalAsync navigation doesn't navigate #19225
  • Be able to pick which environments MAUI targets instead of all of them #11959
  • Re-enable semantic tests on iOS #19345
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Maui Blazor Android cannot force loading addresses with query strings #19033
  • clang++ exited with code 1, error : ld: building for iOS Simulator, but linking in dylib built for iOS #19406
  • Implicit styles declared at different levels do not combine (lowest one wins completely) #19382
    Backlog
  • Allow to set a custom MauiWinUIWindow #19192
  • Crash in release build caused by style #19306
  • Maui Blazor input dropdown list not accepting selected value #13586
    Backlog
  • Android: Pinch gesture not working properly in Carousel #18569
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify ShapeUpdatesBrushCorrectly #19452
  • Merge SR1 fixes into Main #19451
  • [Testing] Added appium UITest for FlyoutNavigationBetweenItemsWithNavigationStacks #19444
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [net9.0] Update with main changes #19441
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Removes dead code from type conversion #19436
    community ✨

Merged

  • Handle Semantics flags more explicitly on iOS #19370
  • [Testing] Add Back method in the UITest lifecycle actions #19442
    area/testing
  • Bump to new stable versions of iOS and Android workloads #19393
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 SR1
  • Remove Fuschia once again... #19434
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] Update net9.0 with new versions #19236
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Flyout layout #19125
    area/shell 🐢
  • [net8.0] Update with main #19381
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, .NET 8 SR2
  • [X] Warn on non compiled bindings #19360
    area/perf 🏎️
  • XamlC WarnAsErrors. #19337
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Trimming] Fix several trimming warnings #19402
    area/publishing 🏁
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁
  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #19048
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Expose generic delegates for BindableProperty via Create method #19431
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area/testing
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, stale, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CosmosDB Provider Support Any(condition) on Nested Collection by mapping to ARRAY_CONTAINS #32626
  • Miracle intech #32625
  • Update daily build image to actually show daily builds #32624
  • TagWith using formattable string takes disproportionately much time #32622
  • InvalidOperationException with JSON columns and owned entities on update #32621

Closed

  • Add-Migration generate migration with missing "using" statement when a property is an enum defined in another namespace and using a conversion. #32552
    9.0.0
  • Wrong ErrorCode reported by SqliteException #27597
    9.0.0
  • Controlling version number (with a prerelease) when building #27527
    9.0.0
  • Document for contributors how to allow missing headers and doc comments in developer builds #25278
    9.0.0
  • Update building guide for Cosmos testing #19814
    9.0.0
  • Calling Contains inside Where produces SQL with OPENJSON error #32623
  • Having navigations for base type and sub type in the same entity result in "Cannot create a relationship ... because a relationship already exists..." exception #32507

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't detect join table with other incoming references as a simple join table #32627

Merged

  • Generate the correct type in snapshot when a property has a value converter #32619
  • Allow to configure Cosmos without specifying connection details. #32620
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Check error code when binding parameters #32613
  • Update developer docs for building packages and using developer build config #32597

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Check value converter configuration source when setting element type. #32612
    Servicing-approved
  • Call virtual SqliteCommand.Parameters instead of using the backing field #32607
    blocked
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Cleanup when error occurs on dispose. #32605
    blocked

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • Unwind changes made to temporarily unblock the .net 9 codflow #17453

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Arcade net9.0 workarounds #17987
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #17986
  • Update the fluent assertions version to improve test failure output. #17982

Merged

  • Add nuget-client patch for shortening sb inner clone path #17991
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #17977
    Branch Lockdown
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17978

Updated

  • Add CoreCLR crossbuild job #17967
  • [VMR] Initial attempt at a Mac VMR build #17934
